name: Upy3D
description:
a game i've been making on and off since february 2019. it is a little shooter that looks 3d but it is actually 2d, like "wolfenstein 3d" and "gun godz" and others.  Unlike those violent things, you dont kill anything in this one, your foes are only knocked out.

use WASD or arrow keys to move, space or E or rightclick to interact with stuff. ctrl or leftclick to use a weapon. hold shift to run. by default the mouse will look around, but you can press F1 to switch to full-keyboard mode, in which case you can hold alt to strafe. you can press the relevant number keys to switch weapon.

you can hit 666 to bring up BAPHOMET. this is cheats. you can ask her for many different things but i won't list them here. please feel free to message me somewhere if you want to know!

it has music by rrrrrose azerty and various cc0 sounds from freesound.org.

the current version is just like, a test build? got a handful of levels? but after 43 test builds i have something i wanna share and i dont feel like working on it more at the moment so here you go
